scripts.start: docker compose up -d --build server web && npm run logs
scripts.start:test: docker compose up -d --build server-test web-test nv-mock
scripts.stop:test: docker compose down server-test web-test nv-mock
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm ci && cd ../web && npm ci && cd ../e2e && npm ci
scripts.e2e:open: npm run start:test && cd e2e && npm start
scripts.e2e:run: npm run start:test && cd e2e && npm test
